text: Limbe Omnisport Stadium is a multi-purpose stadium in Limbe, Cameroon. It is used mostly for football matches and it also has athletics facilities. The stadium has seats for 20,000 people. It was built in 2012 and inaugurated on January 26, 2016. It is one of the few stadiums in the world built on a hill and has a stunning view of the sea. In November 2016 the stadium will host female football matches as part of its first international tournament. == References == ==External links== *Photo at worldstadiums.com Category:Sports venues completed in 2016 Category:Athletics (track and field) venues in Cameroon Cameroon Category:Multi-purpose stadiums in Cameroon Category:Football venues in Cameroon
title: Limbe Stadium
